object_name.value: Validate document is not associated with an inactive Medical Device registration form and non-empty Medical Device code.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution

This document cannot be made ''Effective/Final'' at this time, because it relates to a device with code ($value(dv_device_code)) that's Inactive. If necessary, you should contact the relevant Medical Device Manager(s) to arrange for the device registration to be re-activated, so you can make this document ''Effective/Final''.
cd_product_info where any dv_device_code in ($repeatingvalue(dv_device_code)) and a_status= 'Inactive' and any dv_device_code != ' ' and domain ='Device Management'
